short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access Tessera Data products via our browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This beta version of the Tessera Browser Extension allows users to access two of Tessera Data's client facing products: Automated Criminal Records and Criminal Database. In order to access these products the user needs to have a Client ID issued by Tessera Data. Client IDâ€™s can be obtained by reaching out to chrome-store@tesseradata.com. Any browser extension related questions and requests can be sent to the same email address.
